title: Dodgers agree to 5-year, $74M deal with Edman
description: Tommy Edman and the Dodgers are in agreement on a five-year, $74 million contract extension that includes a sixth-year club option and deferred money.
author: Jeff Passan

title: Bears fire Eberflus after losing 6th straight game
description: A day after the Bears suffered their sixth straight loss, Chicago has fired coach Matt Eberflus, the team announced Friday.
author: Courtney Cronin

title: 'Scots did not show best but can raise bar in Finland'
description: Scotland did not show their best in the Euro 2025 play-off goalless draw with Finland, but Sophie Howard is "very confident" they can improve.

title: 'Maybe it's destiny' - Amorim on Man Utd job & coaching philosophy
description: Manchester United's new manager Ruben Amorim sits down with BBC Sport's Mark Chapman to discuss his new job and coaching philosophy.

title: Norris beats Russell to Qatar Sprint pole as Verstappen, Hamilton struggle
description: Lando Norris claimed an impressive pole position for the Qatar GP Sprint as McLaren struck the first blow in their constructors' title battle with Ferrari by taking first and third on Saturday's grid.

title: Arteta warns Liverpool: Your form will be difficult to sustain
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has warned Liverpool that their lead at the top of the Premier League will be "extremely difficult" to sustain - and believes his side can make up the nine-point gap to the leaders.

title: By firing Matt Eberflus, the Bears refuse to be stuck in the past
description: Chicago had never fired a coach during a season before, but it had to break that weird tradition this time around.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Dodgers utility man Tommy Edman agrees to 5-year, $74 million extension
description: Tommy Edman had a good first year with the Dodgers as the 2024 NLCS MVP.
author: Yahoo Sports
